item.title: 2017 Book List
item.description: Strangers in Their Own Land by Arlie Russell Hochschild The Undoing Project by Michael Lewis What it Takes by Richard Ben Cramer Midnight Riot by Ben Aaronovitch Just Mercy by Bryan Stevenson Moon Over Soho by Ben Aaronovitch Data Science for Business by Foster Provost and Tom Fawcett The UnWinding by George Packer Whispers Underground by Ben Aaronovitch Hillbilly Elegy by J.D. Vance Broken Homes by Ben Aaronovitch Foxglove Summer by Ben Aaronovitch The Hanging Tree by Ben Aaronovitch Evicted by Matthew Desmond SQL Queries for Mere Mortals by John L.

item.title: 2018 Book List
item.description: The Three-Body Problem by Cixin Liu, trans. by Ken Liu Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike by Phil Knight Killers of the Flower Moon: The Osage Murders and the Birth of the FBI by David Grann Gnomon by Nick Harkaway The Ocean at the End of the Lane by Neil Gaiman The Catcher in the Rye by J.D. Salinger Currently Reading: Siddhartha by Herman Hesse
